Name: The Awakening of Mummies
About the game: Using your puzzle-solving skills, guide all mummies through various chambers full of traps to finally set them free from the evil Pharaoh Cléo. How to help these Mummies escape: Control all the Mummies together, that is, by moving them in a certain direction, they all will too. Make sure that each mummy takes the corresponding staff before going to the Totem of the same color, as this is the only way the Portal will open. Take care with: Holes: It is death for sure. Spears: It is not good to be pricked! Keep an eye: Broken Floor: Nothing can happen, but be careful! Magic Mist: Get the crown, otherwise the cumin will be uncertain and the end almost certain. Mud: She will delay you, but it can help you. COMPATIBLE WITH THE NEW TILT FIVE ™ AUGMENTED REALITY SYSTEM! For the Tilt Five™ system, modifications designed to improve immersion in the game have been added, including: Increased intensity and height of particle effects; Positioning the scenery below the board, giving the feeling of playing inside a real chamber of an Egyptian pyramid; Use the Wand to control mummies, allowing the player to select the direction and the mummies will move according to the player's vision.
